createConversationWithSingleAgent.description: Create a new conversation with a specific Agent by ID.

find_conversation.description: Looks up an existing conversation by Agent ID (optionally by conversation ID or Name).

props.name: conversationName
props.description: Search conversation by its name (derived from the first message).

find_message.description: Searches for a specific message by ID (or searches text within messages) inside a conversation.

props.name: searchTerm
props.description: Text to search for in message content. Leave blank if searching by Message ID.

search_agents.description: Find agents by name or ID using search filters.

props.name: name
props.description: Search by agent name (partial matches allowed).

sendMessageToExistingConversation.description: Send a message to an existing conversation with an agent.

props.name: agentMode
props.description: Choose how the agent should respond

props.name: message
props.description: The message you want to send to the agent.

props.name: context
props.description: Number of previous messages to include. 0 = as much as possible, 1 = only last message, etc.

new_agent.description: Triggers when a new AgentX agent is created.

new_conversation.description: Triggers when a new conversation begins with a specific Agent. Only detects conversations created after the trigger is enabled.
